data: CIWA-Ar and PAWSS Protocol for Alcohol Withdrawal Management (Module)
RESTRICTIONS  This is to be used on units where nurses are trained to use the CIWA-Ar assessment tool
Complete Prediction of Alcohol Withdrawal Severity Scale (PAWSS) to guide selection of appropriate CIWA-Ar Protocol
Complete the Prediction of Alcohol Withdrawal Severity Scale (PAWSS)
PLACEHOLDER for a new order for PAWSS Scoring
Initiate Clinical Institute Withdrawal Assessment for Alcohol Use (CIWA-Ar)
Refer to the PAWSS and CIWA Algorithm to guide care
Monitor HR, and BP with each CIWA-Ar assessment
T;N, Hold benzodiazepine and notify physician if
Electrolytes, magnesium level and phosphate level daily x 3 days
200 mg, IM, qdaily, order duration: 5 day, drug form: inj
200 mg, IV, qdaily, order duration: 5 day, drug form: inj
give thiamine 500 mg PO daily x 7 days only if IV/IM route not feasible
500 mg, PO, qdaily, order duration: 7 day, drug form: tab
5 mg, PO, qdaily, order duration: 3 day, drug form: tab
5 mg, IV, qdaily, order duration: 3 day, drug form: inj
1 tab, PO, qdaily, drug form: tab
10 mL, IV, qdaily, drug form: inj
See CIWA-Ar Monitoring and Benzodiazepine Administration

Select only ONE option based on PAWSS score and age   If a PAWSS score previously completed on this admission and patient is believed to be actively experiencing alcohol withdrawal, select ONE option based on age.

CIWA-Ar Score  0 to 9  PAWSS 3 or below OR unable to complete PAWSS due to patient condition. All ages  No LORazepam  CIWA-Ar assessment and monitoring: q1h x 3 hours, then q6h x 24 hours, then q24h x 72 hours

CIWA-Ar Score  10 to 19  PAWSS 3 or below OR unable to complete PAWSS due to patient condition. All ages  No LORazepam. Notify provider for patient reassessment  CIWA-Ar assessment and monitoring: q1h until score below 10
CIWA-Ar Score  10 to 19  PAWSS 4 and above OR exhibiting severe alcohol withdrawal AND 69 years and younger
dose range: 1 to 2 mg, PO, q1h, PRN alcohol withdrawal, drug form: tab
dose range: 1 to 2 mg, sublingual, q1h, PRN alcohol withdrawal, drug form: tab
dose range: 1 to 2 mg, IM, q1h, PRN alcohol withdrawal, drug form: inj
dose range: 1 to 2 mg, IV, q1h, PRN alcohol withdrawal, drug form: inj
CIWA-Ar Score  10 to 19  PAWSS 4 and above OR exhibiting severe alcohol withdrawal AND 70 years and older
dose range: 0.5 to 1 mg, PO, q1h, PRN alcohol withdrawal, drug form: tab
dose range: 0.5 to 1 mg, sublingual, q1h, PRN alcohol withdrawal, drug form: tab
dose range: 0.5 to 1 mg, IM, q1h, PRN alcohol withdrawal, drug form: inj
dose range: 0.5 to 1 mg, IV, q1h, PRN alcohol withdrawal, drug form: inj

CIWA-Ar Score  20 or greater  PAWSS 3 or below OR unable to complete PAWSS due to patient condition. All ages  No LORazepam. Notify provider for patient reassessment  CIWA-Ar assessment and monitoring: q1h until score below 20
CIWA-Ar Score  20 or greater  PAWSS 4 and above OR exhibiting severe alcohol withdrawal AND 69 years and younger
2 mg, PO, q1h, PRN alcohol withdrawal, drug form: tab
2 mg, sublingual, q1h, PRN alcohol withdrawal, drug form: tab
2 mg, IM, q1h, PRN alcohol withdrawal, drug form: inj
2 mg, IV, q1h, PRN alcohol withdrawal, drug form: inj
CIWA-Ar Score  20 or greater  PAWSS 4 and above OR exhibiting severe alcohol withdrawal AND 70 years and older
1 mg, PO, q1h, PRN alcohol withdrawal, drug form: tab
1 mg, sublingual, q1h, PRN alcohol withdrawal, drug form: tab
1 mg, IM, q1h, PRN alcohol withdrawal, drug form: inj
1 mg, IV, q1h, PRN alcohol withdrawal, drug form: inj
Electrolytes, magnesium level and phosphate level daily x 3 days
Electrolytes Panel (Na, K, Cl, CO2, Anion Gap)
